overview: Le Voyageur sans Ombre is a sort of antechamber to Aventures d'Eddie Turley. We can follow step by step the progress of the filming with Philip Dubuquoy, Fran√ßoise Michaud and Joseph Morder during their travels in the South of France (Marseille, Aix-en-Provence, Prades) and in Paris.
title: Le Voyageur sans Ombre Film
